sql.value: select FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SUFFIX, REAL_PATH, BROWSE_PATH, FULL_PATH, FILE_SIZE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME from sys_file where DELETE_STATUS = 1

select FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SUFFIX, REAL_PATH, BROWSE_PATH, FULL_PATH, FILE_SIZE, (select USERNAME from sys_user su where su.ID = sf.CREATE_BY limit 1) as CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, (select USERNAME from sys_user su where su.ID = sf.UPDATE_BY limit 1) as UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME from sys_file sf where DELETE_STATUS = 1
